summary: This MOD adds a stand-alone follower to the potion shop in whiterun(i forgot the shop's name)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]2015/10/30 small upgrade:v1.31 Changed her eyebrows into Warcraft style eyebrows.[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56787-3-1446220219.png[/img][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56787-1-1446220220.png[/img][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56787-2-1446220219.png[/img]

[/size]
[size=3]thanks Darkangelmn for rebuilding the .esp,now the .esp don't have that much useless edit in version 1.2.2[/size]
[size=5]NOTICE[/size][size=5]:[/size]
[size=3]    This mod always need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url], or you may crash to desk when you try to take her cloth,FOR NOW Sabrina is using UNPB body,other kind of bodies vision is coming.
[/size]
[size=5][u]Description[/u][/size]
[size=3]    %>_<% Don't know where to start.This is a simple follower mod,one of my friend  qqending321 like my char Sabrina and asked me to make a follower,so I made this follower mod with him
[/size]
[size=5][u]basic info[/u][/size]
[size=3]name:sabrina[/size]
occupation:mage/archer
body type:stand-alone UNPB body(high resolution textures)
[size=3]level:the same to your char[/size]
[size=3]location: [/size][b]Arcadia's Cauldronthe,the potion shop of Whiterun[/b][size=3]
[/size]

[u][size=5]Customized build:[/size][/u]
[size=3]- Autoleveled(same to your char), marriageable and protected
- Morality: Any crime
- Health/Stamina/Magicka Offsets: 50/50/2000(i don't like a mana-out mage using a tiny dagger to try to stab the enemies)
- Race: nord race
- Starting gear: Her inventory contains ONLY a dress(you don't wan't her wearing it in a battle,so give her some gear) 
- Battle style:She loves Incinerate and she's good at shooting the knees

[/size]
[size=5][u]Installation[/u]:[/size]
[size=4]    Just use NMM to install it or simply extract files to skyrim/data[/size]
[u]
[/u]





[b][u][size=4]Used Resources[/size][/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa

Fair Skin Complexion by [b]HHaleyy[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team

UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by [/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Blessed Redux Project team 

SC - Noble Dresses by [b]ShinglesCat [/b][/url] [/b]used for screenshots

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe by [b]zzjay[/b][/url] used for screenshots

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55914/?]CR Enb by [b]Bigeyescarl[/b] [/url]used for screenshots,highly commended

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12957/?]TWO CASUAL WEARS BY HENTAI - File Fixed - by [b]HENTAI[/b][/url] used for screenshots
[u]
